items.title: Larsen & Toubro board approves Rs 12,000 cr borrowing proposal
items.description: The board at its meeting also approved the appointment of Subramanian Sarma, Whole-time Director & President, Energy as the Deputy Managing Director & President of the Company

items.title: L&T elevates energy vertical head Subramanian Sarma to deputy MD role
items.description: Subramanian Sarma has been instrumental in L&T ramping up its presence in the West Asia's oil and gas industry

items.title: Rasna eyes 30% growth with bets on Q-comm, exports; to invest Rs 50 crore on new plant
items.description: The company is investing around Rs 45-50 crore on a new plant in Patna for manufacturing Litchi concentrates
